column3: Hom nyiyi guansumabew nkurow a menam Moses do kaa kyerɛɛ hom no:"

column2: "na obi a ɔnndze enyidaho na oboku nyimpa bi awerɛfir mu no nguan nkɔ hɔ: na ɔnyɛ hom guansumabew mfi bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no nsa."
"Dɛm nyimpa no nguan nkɔ nkurow no kor mu
column3: na onkegyina kurow no n’abotsen ano
column4: na ɔnka n’asɛm wɔ kurow no ne mpanyimfo asomu; na wɔmfa no nkɔ hɔn nkyɛn wɔ kurow no mu
column5: na wɔmma no beebi ma ɔntsena wɔ hɔn mu."

column2: "Na sɛ bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no tsiw ba a
column3: ɔno mma wonnyi onyimpakumfo no nnhyɛ ne nsa; osiandɛ okum ne nyɛnko awerɛfir mu
nkodu dɛ obegyina amamfo no enyim agye atsɛmbu
column4: nkodu dɛ ɔsɔfopanyin a ɔwɔ do dɛm mber no mu no bowu: na nkyii onyimpakumfo no nsan mbra nankasa no kurow a ofi mu guanee no mu."

column2: "Na woyiyii Kades wɔ Galilii wɔ Naftali nkokodo nkurow no mu
column3: nye Sekem wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu
column4: nye Kiriat-arba a ɔnoara nye Hebron wɔ Juda nkokodo nkurow no mu."

column2: "Na Jeriko Jordan egya boka afamu no
column3: woyii Bezer wɔ sar no do wɔ tɛtɛr no mu fii Reuben ebusuakuw mu
column4: nye Ramot wɔ Gilead fi Gad ebusuakuw mu
column5: nye Golan wɔ Basan fii Manaasɛ ebusuakuw mu."

column2: "Iyinom nye nkurow a woyiyii sisii hɔ maa Israelmba nyinara
column3: nye ɔhɔho a ɔabɔsoɛ hɔn mu no
column4: dɛ obiara a oku nyimpa bi wɔ ber a ɔnndze enyidaho no nguan nkɔ hɔ
column5: na oeennwu wɔ bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no nsamu
column6: nkodu dɛ obegyina amamfo no enyim."
